Another possibility is diastolic failure given his hypertension and likely diabetes.

3. HTN – Poorly controlled, captopril
4. Elevated blood sugar – Will obtain fasting BSs and right for sliding scale insulin. Will obtain HgbA1C
5. Hyperlipidemia – LDL 128 in 2090. Will start statin and check fasting lipid panel in am.

7. Iron deficiency anemia – Will start iron sulfate, recheck ferritin.
